name: Log lỗi hệ thong phân tích tuyển dụng

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "fields": {
    "campaign_name": "{{ $('Normalize data').item.json.campaign_name }}",
    "adset_name": "{{ $('Normalize data').item.json.adset_name }}",
    "ad_name": "{{ $('Normalize data').item.json.ad_name }}",
    
    "impressions": {{ Number($('Normalize data').item.json.Meta_ads_data.impressions || 0) }},
    "spend": {{ Number($('Normalize data').item.json.Meta_ads_data.spend || 0) }},
    "frequency": {{ Number($('Normalize data').item.json.Meta_ads_data.frequency || 0) }},
    "cpc": {{ Number($('Normalize data').item.json.Meta_ads_data.cpc || 0) }},
    "cpm": {{ Number($('Normalize data').item.json.Meta_ads_data.cpm || 0) }},
    "reach": {{ Number($('Normalize data').item.json.Meta_ads_data.reach || 0) }},

    "total_messaging_connection": {{ Number($('Normalize data').item.json.Meta_ads_data.total_messaging_connection || 0) }},
    "page_engagement": {{ Number($('Normalize data').item.json.Meta_ads_data.page_engagement || 0) }},
    "post_engagement": {{ Number($('Normalize data').item.json.Meta_ads_data.post_engagement || 0) }},
    "comment": {{ Number($('Normalize data').item.json.Meta_ads_data.comment || 0) }},
    "messaging_first_reply": {{ Number($('Normalize data').item.json.Meta_ads_data.messaging_first_reply || 0) }},
    "messaging_user_depth_3_message_send": {{ Number($('Normalize data').item.json.Meta_ads_data.messaging_user_depth_3_message_send || 0) }},
    "messaging_welcome_message_view": {{ Number($('Normalize data').item.json.Meta_ads_data.messaging_welcome_message_view || 0) }},
    "like": {{ Number($('Normalize data').item.json.Meta_ads_data.like || 0) }},
    "messaging_conversation_replied_7d": {{ Number($('Normalize data').item.json.Meta_ads_data.messaging_conversation_replied_7d || 0) }},
    
    "Date_start": {{ new Date($('Normalize data').item.json.Date_start).getTime() }},
    "Date_stop": {{ new Date($('Normalize data').item.json.Date_stop).getTime() }}
  }
}
